SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface PatientAppointmentController

All Superinterfaces:
AppointmentController
All Known Implementing Classes:
PatientAppointmentControllerImpl
public interface PatientAppointmentController extends AppointmentController
Interface for managing appointment-related operations specific to patients. This interface extends AppointmentController and provides additional methods tailored to patient needs, such as:
  • Scheduling new appointments.
  • Canceling existing appointments.
  • Rescheduling appointments.
  • Retrieving patient-specific appointment details.

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      boolean scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, LocalDateTime dateTime, String type)
      Schedules a new appointment for a patient with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      dateTime - The date and time for the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment (e.g., Consultation, X-ray).
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully scheduled, false otherwise.

    • cancelAppointment

      boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an existing appointment for a patient.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

    • getPatientAppointments

      List<Appointment> getPatientAppointments(String patientId)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects representing the patient's appointments.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, LocalDateTime newDateTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      newDateTime - The new date and time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • getReschedulableAppointments

      List<Appointment> getReschedulableAppointments(String patientId)
      Retrieves appointments that can be rescheduled for a specific patient. Only appointments that are not canceled or completed are considered reschedulable.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects that are eligible for rescheduling.

    • getAvailableSlotsForRescheduling

      List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableSlotsForRescheduling(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves available time slots for rescheduling a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be rescheduled.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentSlot objects representing available slots for rescheduling.
